name: Santa vs Zombies
description:
Santa vs Zombies is a top down shooter made for Christmas. Fight endless waves of zombies with 5 different weapons.

Santa starts with a pistol with infinite ammo.
The machine gun fires as fast as you can press the button.
The Shotgun fires 5 pellets to thin the herd.
The laser shot pierces.
The rocket launcher is a rocket launcher.

Use the left and right arrow keys to move and up and down arrow keys to move. Spacebar to fire.

See how long you can survive and how high a score you can get!

Merry Christmas!
